group_1.textRight: Ah…
So you were waiting for me at the exit.

group_1.textLeft: Kyuu!

group_1.textRight: (…I wonder why they didn’t follow me inside.)
What do we do?@Should we go into the Coordinator’s?

group_1.textLeft: …Kyuu[wait:0.7]…u…

group_1.textRight: (They look really unwilling!)
Do you not want to go into the Coordinator’s?

group_1.textLeft: Kyuu…?

group_1.textRight: That’s not it…?
…I wonder why then.@Don’t tell me you are afraid of Miss Nanami?

group_1.textLeft: Kyuu kyuu!

group_1.textRight: Oh?
(It seems like I hit right on the mark somehow?)
(She did seem a little cold, but she didn’t seem@like a scary person.)
(That said, I’ve heard in the Wings of the Magius@that Miss Nanami is a person to watch out for.)
(I guess we’ll just give up on going back there…)
A place where Magical Girls gather besides@the Coordinator’s…
Let’s drop by the Wings of the Magius.
(If I can find Azusa-senpai…@She may be willing to help us out about it.)
…A lost child?

group_1.textLeft: You mean that one?

group_1.textCenter: That’s right. I was just wondering if anyone@happened to know anything about them.

group_1.narration: This is Miss Tsukasa Amane…@the younger twin sister of Akatsuki-senpai,@whose kind assistance I am indebted to@at Mizuna Girls’ Academy.
And Azusa-senpai is a graduate@from the same school…@She’s a veteran senpai!
When I came to Azusa-senpai for advice,@she agreed to listen to me along with Tsukasa-san,@who was also there.

group_1.textLeft: …You’re lucky that the Magius weren’t here.

group_1.textRight: Is that so?

group_1.textLeft: Yes. Touka and Nemu really seem to@hate this little one.

group_1.textRight: …Really?
The Magius know about them…?

group_1.textLeft: I’ve never seen them before myself, but…@there are quite a few rumours about them.
There are other stories of Black Feather girls@who saw them in Labyrinths and chased after them,
but the Kyubey immediately ran away.

group_1.textRight: I see…

group_1.textLeft: You said they’re a lost child, right?@How can you tell?

group_1.textRight: There’s someone you want to meet, isn’t there?

group_1.textLeft: …They replied!
I see… They seem to understand our language.

group_1.textRight: Wouldn't the one they want to meet be@a fellow Kyubey?
We don't see any other Kyubeys around in@Kamihama nowadays, do we?

group_1.textLeft: You may be right.

group_1.textRight: Let’s ask them about it.
Are you perhaps trying to meet with@another Kyubey?
[chara:301701:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]Their response feels like they’re saying@“What’s that? Some sort of food?”

group_1.textLeft: If it’s not Kyubey, does that mean it’s a human@they want to meet?

group_1.textRight: But a normal person can’t see them, right?
That’s why I thought it must be a Magical Girl.

group_1.textLeft: I suppose you’re right.
…Is the person you want to meet a Magical Girl?
It seems safe to assume they’re looking for@a Magical Girl.

group_1.textRight: Then, let’s ask the Black Feather girls if@they have any ideas.

group_1.textLeft: Right.@But keep it a secret from the Magius…

group_1.textRight: Understood!
I’ll also ask Tsukuyo if she knows anything about it.
Thank you so much!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, I thought you and Tsukuyo were already@acquainted from school.

group_1.textRight: Erm, I’m grateful to Akatsuki-senpai for@taking care of me at school.
But I don’t think she is aware that I’m a@Black Feather as of yet…

group_1.textLeft: Oh yeah. You usually wear your Black Feather robe@when you come here, right?
Sorry, your replacement robe hasn’t arrived yet.

group_1.textRight: No, it’s fine. Thank you for your concern!
